import React from 'react' function ProfileInfo({ filterAudits, userProfile, levels }) { let totalXP = 0; /* find totalXP */ filterAudits.map(project => totalXP += project.amount) return (

{userProfile.data.user[0].login}

Current level

{levels.data.transaction[0].amount}

XP

{totalXP}

) } export default ProfileInfo
